data.message: I don't like the new changes at all to be honest with you guys! It was so much better when you could send a PM to someone easily trough Facebook. Not like now when you have to go through the messenger app to do that! And everything is upside-down with the search bar too. Not good at all. And several of my friends think so too actually. 🤔

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Anna-Lena. We're constantly working to improve everyone's experience. If you have any feedback, please share with us here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Rhea

Facebook I've been trying to contact you in so many ways possible and no answer from you. Is someone from your team EVER gonna reach out and solve my case? Blocked me from managing pages for NO REASON.
Why?  You don't listen.  Not even a little.
